    • changePokemon

      public void changePokemon(Pokemon newPokemon) throws PoobkemonException
      Changes the currently active Pokemon to another Pokemon from the trainer's inventory.
      Specified by:
      changePokemon in class Trainer
      Parameters:
      newPokemon - The Pokemon to switch to
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - POKEMON_DOESNT_EXIST_IN_THE_INVENTORY_OR_NOT_EXIST if the Pokemon is not in the trainer's inventory

    • changePokemon

      public void changePokemon(String newPokemon) throws PoobkemonException
      Changes the currently active Pokemon to another Pokemon from the trainer's inventory by name.
      Specified by:
      changePokemon in class Trainer
      Parameters:
      newPokemon - The name of the Pokemon to switch to
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - POKEMON_DOESNT_EXIST_IN_THE_INVENTORY_OR_NOT_EXIST if no Pokemon with the given name exists in the trainer's inventory

    • decide

      public String decide(Pokemon pokemon)
      Decision method for the player trainer. This method is likely overridden from the parent class. For PlayerTrainer, decisions are made by the human player, not by AI.
      Specified by:
      decide in class Trainer
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The Pokemon to make a decision for
      Returns:
      A string indicating that decisions are made by the player
